__e: So he used a shotgun to end it.
No, seriously, I gotta tell you, this motherfuckers never carried a gun in 20 years working for my uncle.
Can you tell if he used a weapon?
- Yeah. She wore'em for like a year too long. - Mm-hmm.
No, seriously, I gotta tell you, this motherfuckers never carried a gun in 20 years working for my uncle.
I think that's the first time you've ever used the word "baby."
Did she use the word "Good," or did she say, "It was good"?
She kept saying the word nice. You know what that means, don't you? - She thinks you're nice.
Somebody used your gun to shoot at him last night.
He used your sister... you use his daughter.
He used us and he used you.
Looks like she never used it for anything other than work.
Now, no-one ever- in the whole history of the world- no-one has ever used your voice to say your name.
This the gun you used to kill your own son? He wasn't my son no more.
Is this the weapon you used to murder my wife?
Is that the hand you used to kill my boy?
And he used to take me with him.
I know you were just using me to fuck me.
He used them to make me think that he was you.
And he never liked to get his hands dirty.
He used me to get at you, and... if someone can do that, they can do anything.
He used you and got what he wanted from you, and now don't want nothing more to do with you than I do.
Can you remember when you once wore?
I believe you used those up,and then some,and then some more.
He already took one, so he's gotta take the other two.
Oh, you took the lord's name in vain!
You didn't use the lord's name in vain.
Why'd you use your father's name on the signal?
He used his dad's credit card, and it had a lot of money on it.
Can you tell me where you last used your card?
The same person who can make sure you don't run a tab or a paper trail.
What else did you use the money for?
Why do you think she hasn't distributed that money yet?
It's what he was using me for all along, just like he's been using you.
But your father used your love for me against you. Katherine!
So you used your father and us.
She set your own dogs on you, and you know who they are.
